name: @godot/eslint-plugin-ignore-c-preprocessors
description: eslint plugin which skips C preprocessors.
author: Godot Engine contributors

scripts.build: npx --yes esbuild index.mjs --bundle --platform=node --target=node16 --banner:js='// DO NOT EDIT BY HAND. Use `npm run build` to create this file.' --outfile=index.cjs
